titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to establish election day in Presidential election years as a legal public holiday by moving the legal public holiday known as Veterans Day to election day in such years, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 12/15/2000--Introduced. Designates the Tuesday next after the first Monday in November in 2004 and each fourth year thereafter (election day), and November 11 in any other year, as Veterans Day.Expresses the sense of Congress that private employers should give their employees election day off.
